overview: Hung studs Nacho Vidal and Erik Everhard, on the rebound after being burned by their horny ex-roommate, Selena Rose, convince a buddy, Charles Dera, to move in with them. Charles brings his sexy friends, Riley Steele and Holly Michaels, with him, throwing them into a lusty lion's den of hot, pounding sex. Gorgeous, sultry Kayden Kross joins the naughty boys for a visit, and strokes their broken male egos as well as their long rods, before hopping on top for a wild, perverted ride of sexual pleasures.
tagline: Nothing that a big screw can't fix.
title: Home Wrecker 2
